As we get ready for 2020 and one of the most consequential elections of our lives let us all remember those most in need and get rid of this president and send a message about our values.

But Republicans know this. Their tax bill gave all the benefits to capital and none to labor including punishing states like Illinois by capping the SALT deduction. I opposed that bill because our tax code should reward American families not billionaires and corporations.

They intentionally use such a huge swath of workers to obfuscate the ridiculous gains the top 1% has experienced. The vast difference between the top and the bottom of the highest quartile of earners is offensive.
